dct_title_s: A topographical map of the northn. part of New York Island : exhibiting the plan of Fort Washington, now Fort Knyphausen, shewing the several attacks of the Royal army
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes descriptive index. In upper right margin: to face page 210, vol. I. "Published April 12th, 1793." Probably issued in: The history of the origin, progress, and termination of the American war / by C. Stedman ... London : Printed for the author, and sold by J. Murray ... , 1794. Originally published by William Faden in 1777. cf. British Library. Map Library. American War of Independence, no. 116.
